channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hardcore material spilled onto roadway, 18th September
item.description:
A mass of rocks and stones have been left in two trails on the highway causing risk of serious injury to cyclists and motorcyclists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Curtismill Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More rubbish dumped along Footpath 83, 18th September
item.description:
Lots more rubbish dumped all along Footpath 83. There are also some barricades, the sort usually put around road/pavement works that have been at the Stratton Road end of Footpath 83 for ages and are usually ignored by the people picking up the rubbish. Could they please remove these as well next time they attend.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rowan Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose manhole cover, 18th September
item.description:
There is a metal cover on a man hole which has become loose and is creating a loud bang every time a car drives over it. This has been going on for over a month now and is creating a lot of noise and is disturbing sleep at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Endymion Road, Stroud Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Since last Saturday, I reported to you about :"Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is is towards the edge, near the tree which is near the small tree that is in front of 95 Fernhead Road.", 18th September
item.description:
Since last Saturday, I reported to you about:" Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is near the kerb and ,is in front of 95 Fernhead Road ". I also reported this to you, on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and now Thursday! So far this has not been cleaned up! This is definitely dog fouling. The area needs to be washed down. The past reference numbers are, 8163285, 8168265 and 8180083. Please please please please, could this be cleaned up ASAP. There is also bagged up dog fouling besides a tree which is in front of 91 Fernhead Road , and the tree is on the corner of Fernhead Road and Fordingley Road. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branch broken and fallen, 18th September
item.description:
A large branch has broken off of an oak tree and is propped up by another branch but will fall completely at some point and would seriously injure someone. The branch is overhanging a footpath on the Warren

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broomfield Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mice outside my flat, 18th September
item.description:
There are a huge disgusting amount of mice outside my flat, they come out in the day and night. It is scary for my children, filthy and dirty to the public. This needs to be dealt with as soon as possible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plough Yard, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed left in private parking space, 18th September
item.description:
Furniture was left for official large waste collection over night, overnight this was taken by passers by however somebody took the opportunity to leave a bed as a replacement - this was not taken as part of the large waste collection due to it not being mine and included on the list of items.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Warner Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin still being used to reserve parking space, 18th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickwick Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet
